questions.title: Question 1 for Class 190923
questions.main: Which of the following is not correct concerning a cold front?
questions.answer: C) it is colored purple on a weather map

mcq.option: A) it marks the position of a trough of low pressure
B) it marks a zone of shifting winds
C) it is colored purple on a weather map
D) it has cold air behind it

questions.title: Question 2 for Class 190923
questions.main: If the earth's atmosphere did not contain any water vapor the sky would have a ____ color.

questions.title: Question 3 for Class 190923
questions.main: The blue color of the sky is due to:
questions.answer: A) selective scattering of visible light by air molecules

mcq.option: A) selective scattering of visible light by air molecules
B) the filtering effect of water vapor in the earth\'s atmosphere
C) reflection of sunlight off the earth\'s oceans
D) transmission of visible light through the ozone layer in the earth\'s stratosphere

questions.main: Colored rings that appear around the shadow of an aircraft is called the:

questions.title: Question 6 for Class 190923
questions.main: What color would the sky be if air molecules selectively scattered only the longest wavelengths of visible light?

questions.title: Question 7 for Class 190923
questions.main: In an enhanced infrared satellite image how would thunderstorms appear?
questions.answer: Normally cumulonimbus clouds with cold tops are assigned the darkest gray color.

questions.title: Question 8 for Class 190923
questions.main: When a beam of white light passes through a glass prism it is separated into its component colors. This is called:

questions.title: Question 9 for Class 190923
questions.main: Explain why rain shadows form on the leeward side of mountains.
questions.answer: Because the clouds and precipitation generally form on the upwind side of the range and by the time the air gets to the leeward side there's not much moisture left.

questions.title: Question 10 for Class 190923
questions.main: Detached clouds of delicate and fibrous appearance without shading usually white in color and sometimes of a silky appearance are:
